abilities.name: Herald of Ynnead
abilities.rule: **Herald of Ynnead:** At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly **AELDARI** model makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re‐roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Word of the Phoenix
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, D3+1 destroyed Bodyguard models (excluding **SUPPORT WEAPON** models) are returned to that unit with their full wounds remaining.
